en-US.summary: Quickly find if trains are delayed for stations within the UK.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask train departures to get departures for London Kings Cross
Alexa, ask train departures to get departures
get departures for London Kings Cross
en-US.name: UK Train Departures
en-US.description: Have you ever woken up and were worried if you were going to be late to an event because of a delayed train? Now you can get live departure status from stations across the UK by simply saying, Alexa, ask train departures to get departures​.
